innhold.avsnitt: The parental benefit shall cover the income you normally receive up to seksG kroner (six times the National Insurance Scheme basic amount (G)). Here you can read about how the parental benefit is calculated.

Parental benefit is paid by the 25th of the month. You can log in and see the payments you have received from NAV over the last three years. If you get paid parental benefit from your employer, you must contact the employer for the pay date and payout schedule.
